title: Media Recordings
description: The Latin American and Caribbean Studies program video records many of its se
text:
Media Recordings
The Latin American and Caribbean Studies program video records many of its seminar series, annual lecturer, and LACS public issues forum events; in addition, we also have a special video on Ecuador's Ecosystems. The link below will lead you to the LACS YouTube site where you can browse the selection of lectures. Here are some of the most recent ones.

Simposio Latinoamericano de Avances de Investigación en SARS-CoV-2
A LACS Public Issues Forum, September 16-17, 2020, Co-sponsored with the Colombian Virologic Association (Asociación de Virología de Colombia-AVC), 11 presentations listed below:
DAY 1 Sept 16th
-
Zulma Cucunubá |
[Impacto de COVID-19 y estrategias de control en América Latina: el papel del modelamiento epidemiológico](https://youtu.be/Vf_VUZcIJuI)

[Dificultades de diagnóstico de SARS-CoV-2 en los trópicos](https://youtu.be/KDkXVCXYSl4)
- Gina Polo |
